Query.Sentence: select p.plate_name, count(*) as travels from registros_camiones rc inner join plates p on rc.id_plate =p.id_plate #WHERE# group by p.plate_name

select delivery_note, trailer_plate_name, scan_volume_in, scan_volume_out, length*height *width as vol_teorico, (scan_volume_in/(length*height*width)) as porcentaje_entrada, (scan_volume_out/(length*height*width)) as porcentaje_salida from registros_camiones rc left join plates p on rc.id_plate =p.id_plate left join trailer_plates tp on rc.id_trailer_plate=tp.id_trailer_plate left join delivery_notes dn on rc.id_delivery_note =dn.id_delivery_note #WHERE#
